attributes.action: Investigate the development of hybrid trolley busses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The infrastructure costs of tram systems are unrecoverable, the amount of disruption caused while installing them is immense, they're also noisy and inflexible. The overhead power grids would be better used to power diesel electric busses, lorries and delivery vans. These vehicles could use diesel while outside the reach of the power grids, then switch to electricity within towns and cities.
